thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 4 of 625
thread.title: Stephanie Byun

author: Stephanie Byun
title: Stephanie Byun
text:
Good choice of Asian products that are normally difficult to find elsewhere. Make sure you read the reviews beforehand bc I find that the sizes are often very different from American sizes. But I ordered eyelashes and other makeup products and found that in general the prices are quite decent (cheaper than buying it in those small Asian shops in NYC at least) and they ship in good condition.
Be sure to check when your products are available to ship because you need to add that on to your shipping speed when calculating when your products are going to come (which I thought was a little misleading, but maybe I'm just a little out of it).. Also when it charges to your card (I use Bank of America), it also adds a conversion fee, which I didn't realize beforehand (and also added a conversion fee when I got a partial refund for a product they did not have in stock - so I was essentially paying for something that wasn't my fault? - though I guess it might not have been YesStyle's fault either that their vendors didn't have the listed product)..
